tool.name: Align Sample Spectra
tool.description: Step 5 of SimStitch. Align sample spectra
tool.command:
#set $tool_directory = $getVar('__tool_directory__', '../../../../tools/SimStitch') #if str($executable.value) == "true" sh $tool_directory/run_AlignSample.sh /usr/local/MATLAB/MATLAB_Compiler_Runtime/v81 '${fileList}' '${html_input}' '${html_input.extra_files_path}' $blankPPM $samplePPM $combPPM '${peakmatrix}' '${peakmatrix_row}' '${peakmatrix_col}' > '${output_log}'
#else matlab -logfile '${output_log}' -nosplash -r "cd('$tool_directory'); try; AlignSample('${fileList}', '${html_input}', '${html_input.extra_files_path}', $blankPPM, $samplePPM, $combPPM, '${peakmatrix}', '${peakmatrix_row}', '${peakmatrix_col}'); catch; end; exit;" #end if

param.name: fileList
param.label: List tof files (.xml) produced by File List manager

param.name: html_input
param.label: list of files (.html) produced by Replicate Filtering

param.name: blankPPM
param.label: the ppm error to be used for the blanks (default = 2)

param.name: samplePPM
param.label: the ppm error to be used for the samples (default = 2)

param.name: combPPM
param.label: the ppm error to be used for aligning samples to blanks (default = 2)

data.name: peakmatrix_row
data.label: Align Samples Spectra on $html_input.hid: Row Headers

data.name: peakmatrix_col
data.label: Align Samples Spectra on $html_input.hid: Column Headers

tool.help: This tool aligns the newly formed sample spectra (post replicate filtering). It aligns any blanks together, then any other samples together and then combines these two groups.
